name: type/question
comment:
Please ask your question on [community.grafana.com/](https://community.grafana.com/). See also our [issue reporting](https://github.com/grafana/grafana/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#report-bugs) guidelines.

Happy Coding!

name: type/duplicate
comment:
Thanks for creating this issue! We figured it's covering the same as another one we already have. Thus, we closed this one as a duplicate. See also our [issue reporting](https://github.com/grafana/grafana/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#report-bugs) guidelines.

Happy Coding!
